short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste your password on the NCB Personal Banking login page without hassle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preventing the pasting of passwords is bad, mkay? It reduces security as it forces users to choose weak passwords that are short enough to remember and prevents password managers from automatically pasting into password fields whenever users need to log in. 

Need more reasons why blocking password pasting is bad? See this article by Troy Hunt: https://www.troyhunt.com/the-cobra-effect-that-is-disabling/.
